com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models

Class ServiceProperties.Logging

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.microsoft.windowsazure.services.blob.models.ServiceProperties.Logging
  • Enclosing class:
    ServiceProperties

    public static class ServiceProperties.Logging
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the logging options that can be set on a storage account.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ServiceProperties.Logging()
